name: You Don't Get an Ad Blocker for This, Sorry.
name_original: You Don't Get an Ad Blocker for This, Sorry.
description:
Hey!
You gotta try to get to the finish line in 10 seconds! 
Unfortunately for you, your ad blocker is off and pop up ads are preventing you from winning!

Controls:

WASD to move 
ESC to show cursor 
Left Mouse Button to click 

Music by: McKenzie Hoagland

FP Drifter - Ben Esposito
Farland Skies/Cloudy Crown - Borodar (Unity Asset Store)
